summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 ALFA RLST RV (NA).  THE VEHICLE HAS GOODYEAR VIVA TIRES, SIZE LT235/85/R16.  ON FOUR DIFFERENT OCCASIONS, WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 65 MPH, THE TREAD COMPLETELY SEPARATED FROM THE TIRES WITHOUT WARNING.  PRIOR TO THE FAILURE, THE TIRE PRESSURE WAS PERCEIVED AS BEING NORMAL.  THE GOODYEAR TECHNICIAN REPLACED TWO OF THE TIRES FOR FREE AND GAVE A PARTIAL DISCOUNT FOR THE REMAINING TWO.  THE CONTACT STILL HAS POSSESSION OF THE TIRES.   THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 10,000.    UPDATED 6/29/09 *CN  THE CONSUMER STATED GOODYEAR PAID FOR ALL 4 TIRES. UPDATED 06/30/09.*JB
